website_summaries.verdict: The EGO Waterproof Sound Case lets you enjoy your iPod outdoors while protecting player from the harsh effects of the elements--and it does an excellent job of it.
pros: The EGO Waterproof Sound Case for iPod features an innovative design that successfully protects the player during submersion in water
It's also compact and durable, it features a handy kickstand, and the clear casing gives it a cool, retro look
cons: The Waterproof Sound Case doesn't include a remote, and the integrated speakers are lacking in bass

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I use my ipod nano in these speakers and it works great. I use it in the shower, at the beach, camping, anywhere! It is great because it keeps my ipod clean and dry. I have dropped it completely into water, and it was fine. It gets pretty loud for just running on batteries and being so compact. I bought some rechargeable AAs, so I don't go through so many. Normally, when I only use it in the shower, the rechargeable batteries last for 2 weeks or so. No complaints here, I love it! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and the best deal I've found for waterproof speaker systems but could use some improvement... The speakers are not really loud enough for my liking, especially for a float trip. I've only used this twice and have found the battery life to be very disappointing as well. Also, the box shows this floating in a pool but the instructions say 'Do Not Submerge'. While I never intend to SUBMERGE it, I am concerned about how well it will actually protect my iPod on a float trip, which was my original purpose for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kumer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for portable, waterproof speakers. This locked case with speakers as one lightweight piece seemed to fit the bill. No extra parts to keep track of. Easy to set up with the nano and sound is good to very good for the price. I am using it in the bathroom with no worries about accidentally knocking it into the tub. Downside is that you MUST have four AA batteries. There is no electric adaptor for this...but, duh! wouldn't want it to fall in the water plugged in. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Ginahmk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this watercase for our recent catamaran trip of the British Virgin Islands. It was a great addition to our vacation. We threw the iPod and case off the back of the boat and hung out in the water with our floats and great music. There were no worries about the safety of our iPod. My husband got a kick out of turning the case over so the speakers were in the water and the going under and listening to the music underwater. We now have this great product for our pool. We LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O'Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pool side, hut tub and boats
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this for all my fishing excursions on our bass boat. Like others have mentioned before me, don't be expecting the sound blow to you away. The maximum setting is a comfortable volume that you can enjoy if you have this near you without disturbing others who are at least 30 feet away. The quality of the sound is perfect - no vibrations or scratchy noises from the speakers. The whole unit is really neat looking since it is all clear and you can see everything inside it. Please be advise that this unit is not as small you you might think from looking at the item image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Little IPod Speakers
customer_reviews.text: This is a cool little product that I just recently took on a cruise to Bermuda. It worked very well in the room for the whole week and I didn't change the batteries once. I had it at full volume whenever it was playing and it was just right for indoors. I would have liked just a little extra volume for out on the beach but all in all it worked great
customer_reviews.author: Neal Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Fine until you take it outside
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for the shower and the pool. However, I took it to the beach on a vacation so we could have some music and the sand ended up destroying it. While no water ever got on the ipod, the sand seemed to be able to get into the speakers and into the nooks and cranies. If you plan to have this from home use this is a fine product but it cant really much more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Wet Music
customer_reviews.text: This unit really surprised me. It sounds good (even at high volumes). The batteries last a long time. It keeps the ipod nice and dry. It comes with an adjustable strap to hang it over the shower head. Just don't plan on being able to search for a song. The rubber over the ipod wheel doesn't make it easy to use. Clicking the wheel works just fine. It also has external power and volume controls that work well. It makes those early mornings a little more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Works great and as described
customer_reviews.text: Works great and as described. However it is a little bit of a pain in the neck when trying to change the song. I would prefer one of the smaller units that are now available that use Bluetooth as opposed to having to be wired in.
customer_reviews.author: KERI & YUMI

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my sportsman kayak no leaks and very good sound, it is a little difficult to use the click wheel, but when I put on a playlist I don't need to change it. Power and volume controls are easy to use. I am using a 80 gig iPod video, nice fit!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis McG

customer_reviews.title: IPOD Waterproof Docking Case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use with my aquatic classes. The product works, the controls are easy to manipulate, but the sound is not loud enough for a pool environment. If you are using this docking station at home, it will perform to your satisfaction. But in a public pool, it just didn't produce the sound we needed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for years and it still works. Since it probably can't be found to purchase, I guess this really doesn't matter much.
customer_reviews.author: JPatrickR

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and boyfriend proof!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the case for my boyfriend who is an avid shower taker AND swim coach in the area. He loves music around him at all times, but he is hard on his stuff. The eGo waterproof soundcase is great! He was excited when he got it, and his swimmers all liked it too. They listen to music before practice and he doesn't have to worry about anything getting wet. The only drawback would be the batteries. You can't use cheap batteries or you will burn through them quickly. Pay a little more and they last a longer time. All in all, he is completely happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pfrommer

customer_reviews.title: Love my EGO!
customer_reviews.text: This little tool is indispensable for the beach, boat, pool - any place including water and/or sand! Doesn't get terribly loud so doesn't suffice for a sound system but great portable for small areas! Love it! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: jacqofhearts

customer_reviews.title: Great Box overall with only a couple short falls.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I imagined, but I'm still impressed. I'm very surprised on the battery choice though. To get some decent life out of the unit at full volume one would think the designer would have incorporated the use of C or D size batteries resulting in minimal weight gain. Purchasing experience wise, there needs to be more clarity on the differences between the models as to what iPod each supports and if there is a plan to support the latest iPOD, either with a new model or a foam wedge if it fits in this existing one. Overall, 4.8/5.
customer_reviews.author: Ben.

customer_reviews.title: Great and safe way to listen to your IPod!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the EGo Sound Case.Don't expect big sound, but you'll get good sound. It is nice to have my IPod safe when I am by the pool or outside where it might get wet. It is a definite must for an IPod accessory. :)
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Missing part.  Should have described it as missing.
customer_reviews.text: The eGo sound case works well with my 4th generation nano. The battery cover is missing in the area where you put the nano therefore you have to open the case to make changes with the nano wheel. The whole purpose was to buy a player that was water tight and I would not have bought it if I had known the bettery cover was missing. Otherwise the sound is good.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Butler

customer_reviews.title: Volume is Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: The volume on this is so low you can barely hear it. I don't recommend use for anything outdoors. Maybe for in the shower or something and that's about it. The construction seems sturdy and it's pretty easy to use. Just couldn't hear the darn thing!
customer_reviews.author: ads10

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof ipod case
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my children and they both think it is great. They said the sound is good. They are looking forward to taking to the beach in the summer. Now they are just using it ithe shower.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good player
customer_reviews.text: This product is good but would want better sound quality. The cover had a sticker that said to turn the sound check on my ipod so that did help with the sound quality. Seems to work well and it is nice in the shower and outside.
customer_reviews.author: FTCShopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Too bad you can't find / buy these any more. They are amazing for traveling / camping! Sound quality for a small unit is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty good for the money. It comes with adapters to fit the Nano or regular iPods. The sound is amazingly good, considering it's in the shower with running water. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: EGO Waterproof MP3 Player Case with Speakers If I had this last year. I wouldn't have drowned my prior i-Pod.
customer_reviews.author: David Royston

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product works really great. My husband and I have enjoyed it very much. The batteries have lasted great and it has decent volume for the shower. Overall it is an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Compact Portable Soundystem for your iPod--Waterproof too!
customer_reviews.text: Not often do you get a device that actually works as billed. The Ego gives a very good sound. Waterproof, floats in the pool. Pretty good volume. Comes with carrying strap, protective cloth bag. looks great and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Wizard

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!! Everywhere I looked for this it was at least 100.00, when I found it here for 1/2 the price, I had to get it. It works great and will come in handy for the next river trip!!! It also works great with other MP3 players; not just Ipods. I have a Opal from RCA and it fits into the player just fine. There are several different inlays you can use to fit your MP3 snuggly!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy L. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: No Wet Music
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best items I've purchased. Keeps my Ipod dry and cranks out the tunes. I use it in the boat, on the deck and in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Evans

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are fantactic! Had them for 4 years and used on 20+ rafting/floating/camping trips. They have been completely submerged on multiple occasions and still sound great! The iPod stayed completely dry as well. Product is exactly as described and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend for a Christmas present. She has an ipod and I have a Dell mp3 player. I can use my Dell mp3 player on this because it uses the headphone jack instead of the connection on the bottom of the ipod. I choose this particular speaker case for that one reason. Too many devices are used exclusively with ipods and the rest of us are left with fewer choices. Im glad I found this one. The speakers can be VERY loud, so if you are unsure as to whether or not you can or cant hear these speakers while in the shower, I promise you can.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: EGO Waterproof iPod speakers
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I wanted to take our music salmon fishing in Alaska - this was the perfect way to do it! We were on a boat for 2 weeks and never had to worry about the iPod or speakers getting wet. The only thing I wish is that the volume could be higher (or maybe it can be and I couldn't figure it out!) but other than that I would recommend this item for anyone who wants to share their iPod music at the pool, beach, lake, etc. etc.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this product for an Ipod deck for my shower. It works very well, and I was surprised to hear such quality sound coming from it with just four AA batteries (which I haven't had to change out yet). A nice gadget, thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful & Honest

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The sound is good but could be louder. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Diskin

customer_reviews.title: fun in the shower
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he really likes it. I think it's hard to turn on or change songs through the rubber material but I still like it. If I found one that was easier to work I would replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Blaney

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Product
customer_reviews.text: best ipod case i ever bought i used it kyaking canoing and got it wet many times shake the water out of the speakers and its ready to go and it can also handle a fall pretty good i have dropped my numerous times and knock on wood havnt broke it yet
customer_reviews.author: Chum

customer_reviews.title: EGO Waterproof Sounds Case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for canoe trip with 4 canoes. It worked well, played for a long time. It did not play as loud as I would have hoped for all of us to hear. I now keep it in the shower and it works just fine. Keeps all dry. I use it for my ipod video player and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Barkley

customer_reviews.title: I love this so much!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I take it in the shower and to the pool, beach whatever. I listen while putting on make-up. It's just great!! I wish it would have a bit better speakers so it could go up louder, but that is the only thing I could say needs upgraded on this Ego Waterproof Ipod Sound Case Speakers!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea bad execution
customer_reviews.text: Quality Control... look into it. An hour after setting it up it stopped working. Two days later it was rusted to crap.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my teens to take to a swim conference to pass the time. It withstood the rigors of being on the pool deck and the sound volume could be heard easily in their group despite the noise of conference participants. Great way to protect the ipods from water damage. Wish we knew about this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Singing in the Shower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday. She loves it. She plays her ipod in the shower and we have even taken it to the beach. It is fantastic! It is water and sand proof. She plays music on it every day and the batteries are still running strong after 3+ weeks. We love it! It is all it said it would be.
customer_reviews.author: K. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We love the beach and we are usually each sitting plugged into our individual ipods.....this was the perfect solution. The sound quality is remarkable,considering its such a small piece of equipment. It also comes with a drawstring case which makes it handy for taking along. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Monahan

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Speakers don't play as loud as I would have liked but overall not bad. I bought it for outdoor pool use so I am sure it works better indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P. Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but could be louder!
customer_reviews.text: This item is a very good, water tight sealed ipod speaker. It is one of the only ones that actually fully protects your ipod. It could be a little louder but all in all this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: ckerr19

customer_reviews.title: eGo is a go!
customer_reviews.text: Great way to take music on canoe trips and to the lake. Compact and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Wagaman

customer_reviews.title: This is in the top 5 coolest things I own..
customer_reviews.text: I am a freaken ROCK STAR when I strap this baby to my kayak. There is not much that comes close to paddling Lake Chelan on a cloudy, windy day with the Scorpions or Disturbed blaring in your face. My Otter Boxes for my iPods are really neat, but the headphones are very uncomfortable. THIS IS A MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Drew

customer_reviews.title: Singing in the shower
customer_reviews.text: This works great. My iPod stays dry and I can change music tracks easily. Case is a little bulky for hanging from my shampoo rack.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

product_meta.title: eGo Waterproof Sound Case with Dual Speakers for iPod (Clear)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingYou can now boost your iPod's ego with the EGO 25906033 Sound Case. Boasting a protective and portable all-weather design, the EGO 25906033 Sound Case expands the versatility of your iPod. Waterproof up to 3.3 feet, shatter-proof, spill-proof, and resistant to corrosion by pool or salt water, the EGO has a crystal-clear polycarbonate body. The shatterproof casing comes equipped with two speakers and exterior controls that are incredibly easy to use. Just place your iPod into the waterproof, sealed compartment, secure it with the snap-lock latch, and you're ready to take your favorite music and videos with you.

AMAZON.COM


Boost your iPod's ego with the EGO 25906033 Sound Case. Head down to the beach and fight the sand-kicking bullies with your favorite tunes, throw it in your boat for a fishing or kayaking trip, or fire up a shampooing soundtrack in shower.

All-Weather, Submersible Case
Boasting a protective and portable all-weather design, the EGO 25906033 Sound Case expands the versatility of your iPod. Waterproof up to 3.3 feet, shatter-proof, spill-proof, and resistant to corrosion by pool or salt water, the EGO has a crystal-clear polycarbonate body. The shatterproof casing comes equipped with two speakers and exterior controls that are incredibly easy to use. Just place your iPod into the waterproof, sealed compartment, secure it with the snap-lock latch, and you're ready to take your favorite music and videos with you.

Plenty of Performance
Featuring rubber bumper guards for added protection, the EGO is powered by dual, full-range neodymium drivers that deliver optimum performance, whether you're splashing in the pool, running in the rain, or singing in the shower. Provides 30 hours of big sound on four AA batteries. There's also a viewing window that clearly displays text and video images.

Listening/Viewing Options
For added convenience, the EGO features an adjustable stand for optimal video viewing, adjustable wrist and shoulder straps for easy mobility, and a waterproof click membrane that allows you to change music or video without removing your iPod.

Not Just for iPods
The EGO works with 4G iPods and up, as well as a variety of other MP3 players. Players are connected with a standard 3.5mm headphone jack, so any player you can fit in there is good to go.

What's in the Box
EGO Waterproof Sound Case, Carrying Bag, 4 AA Batteries, Shoulder Strap, Wrist Strap, iPod Spacers
